definition: Leuven (a town in Belgium famous for its university)
(bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]
Wen River in northwest Sichuan (same as 汶川)/classical name of river in Shandong, used to refer to Qi 齊國|齐国

sentences.english: The Leuven Research Centre for Translation, Communication and Cultures.
sentences.chinese: 对翻译，通信和文化鲁汶研究中心。

sentences.english: I'm in my second year of Chinese studies at Leuven University, Belgium.
sentences.chinese: 我是比利时人，在鲁汶大学的汉学系，上二年纪。

definition: Uppsala, Swedish university city just north of Stockholm
Technical University of Berlin, Germany (Technische Universitaet zu Berlin)
pinyin: Bo2 lin2 Gong1 ye4 Da4 xue2

definition: München or Munich, capital of Bavaria, Germany
Sachsen or Saxony, Bundesland in east of Germany, bordering on Poland and Czech republic, capital Dresden 德累斯頓|德累斯顿[De2 lei4 si1 dun4]
